abstract: The media conglomerate is trying to expand the global reach of “High School Musical” to squeeze even more money from the franchise.
snippet: The media conglomerate is trying to expand the global reach of “High School Musical” to squeeze even more money from the franchise.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  How do you sing “bop to the top” in Hindi? If you are the Walt Disney Company, very carefully.

headline.main: Disney Youth Don’t Bop; They’re Singing in Hindi
headline.print_headline: Disney Youth Don’t Bop; They’re Singing in Hindi
